CONFIRM STAY AT FACILITY FOR 24 HOURS AFTER DELIVERY  
Half of all maternal deaths and 40% of neonatal deaths occur during the first 24 hours after 
childbirth. WHO therefore recommends that the mother and her newborn should be ob-
served in the health facility for at least 24 hours before discharge.29,30,31
